
==replay::linear_component3 Reference==

{{{
#include lines3.hpp
}}}
Base class for parametric line-like objects, like lines, rays and segments. Represents a function $R \longrightarrow R^3$. 
====direction====
{{{
  vector3f replay::linear_component3::direction
}}}
  Direction. Corresponds to a difference of 1 in the parameter. 
====origin====
{{{
  vector3f replay::linear_component3::origin
}}}
  Origin. Point at parameter 0.

}}}
  Get the point: $origin + t * direction$. tThe parameter to the equation.
